full_name: Boosting monte carlo rendering by ray histogram fusion
comment: Implementation based on the original code provided by the authors.
citation: Delbracio, M., Musé, P., Buades, A., Chauvier, J., Phelps, N., and Morel, J.-M. 2014. Boosting monte carlo rendering by ray histogram fusion. ACM Transactions on Graphics 33, 1, 1–15.
